rukus.text: By the sky having the constellations
and by the promised day
and by a witness and a witnessed
Damn the directors of the fire pit
the fire having (plenty of) the fuel
when they sat around it
and they were witnesses over what they did to the believers
And they only took revenge from them for believing in God the powerful, the praiseworthy
The One that the rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and God is a witness over everything
Indeed those who persecuted (and tortured) the believing men and the believing women and did not repent, punishment of hell is for them and the burning punishment is for them
Indeed those who believed and did good works, for them are gardens which rivers flow through them. That is the great victory
Indeed your Masterâ€™s assault is severe
Indeed He initiates and repeats (the creation)
and He is the forgiving, the most friendly
owner of the glorious throne
doer of what He wants
Did the story of the armies come to you
Pharaoh and the Thamud
But those who disbelieved are in a denial
And God is surrounding over and above them
This is a glorious Quran
in a guarded (and protected) tablet
